verses.verse: Thus all the <S%H4399>work<s%> that <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H7999>finished<s%>: and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> in all the <S%H6944>things<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H6944>dedicated<s%>; and the <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and all the <S%H3627>instruments<s%>, <S%H5414>put<s%> he among the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and all the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%>, the <S%H5387>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> out of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, which is <S%H6726>Zion<s%>.
Why all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> themselves unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> in the <S%H2282>feast<s%> which was in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>.
And all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%>; and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> took <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%>.

And they brought <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%>, and the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and all the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> that were in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, these did the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> bring <S%H5927>up<s%>.

Also <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, and all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that were <S%H3259>assembled<s%> unto him <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%>, <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> and <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, which could not be <S%H5608>told<s%> nor <S%H4487>numbered<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>.

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> brought <S%H935>in<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto his <S%H4725>place<s%>, to the <S%H1687>oracle<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%>, into the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3671>place<s%>, even under the wings of the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%>:

For the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> over the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H727>ark<s%>, and the <S%H3742>cherubims<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> and the <S%H905>poles<s%> there <S%H4605>above<s%>.

And they drew <S%H748>out<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> of the <S%H7218>ark<s%>, that the ends of the <S%H905>poles<s%> were <S%H7200>seen<s%> from the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1687>oracle<s%>; but they were not <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%>. And there it is unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

There was nothing in the <S%H727>ark<s%> except the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> in it at <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>, when the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a covenant with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when they came <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And it came to <S%H3548>pass<s%>, when the priests were come <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H3548>place<s%>: (for all the priests that were <S%H4672>present<s%> were <S%H6942>sanctified<s%>, and did not then <S%H8104>wait<s%> by <S%H4256>course<s%>:

Also the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> which were the <S%H7891>singers<s%>, all of them of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>, of <S%H1968>Heman<s%>, of <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%>, with their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H251>brothers<s%>, being <S%H3847>arrayed<s%> in white <S%H948>linen<s%>, having <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> and <S%H5035>psalteries<s%> and <S%H3658>harps<s%>, <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the east <S%H4217>end<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and with them a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H2690>sounding<s%> with <S%H2689>trumpets<s%>:)

It came even to <S%H2690>pass<s%>, as the trumpeters and <S%H7891>singers<s%> were as <S%H259>one<s%>, to make <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6963>sound<s%> to be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H1984>praising<s%> and <S%H3034>thanking<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and when they lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voice<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> and <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> and <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H7892>music<s%>, and <S%H1984>praised<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H2896>saying<s%>, For he is good; for his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> endures for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: that then the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with a <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, even the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>;

So that the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5975>stand<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> by <S%H6440>reason<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud<s%>: for the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.
